content: this unisex hat is so cozy you may not want to take it off if you feel like wandering make sure this hat wanders off with you it is loose-fitting slouchy oh-so-warm and even reversible the sweet and simple detail around the brim is like a touch of icing on a cupcake this hat is knit in stockinette stitch making this a great hat for showing off a luxurious yarn or a favourite colour it also makes for perfect travel knitting this hat is knit from the bottom to the crown twice with a light fingering weight yarn this hat has three sizes and no visible seam *note * for gauge accuracy choose two yarns of the same brand **skill level ** rookie-**apprentice**-virtuoso-genius **finished measurements ** approx 26/28/30 cm wide and 26 cm tall lying flat after blocking fits a 53/56/59 cm head
